thread.title: Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s Fiercest Defender Goes On Trial

author: Erica Orden
title: Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s Fiercest Defender Goes On Trial
text:
Democratic strategist Bill Hyers is used to navigating political feuds, but few turned quite as heated as when he nearly came to blows with Joseph Percoco, then an aide to Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
In 2013, on the sidelines of an event outside City Hall during the mayoral campaign of Bill de Blasio, Mr. Percoco and Mr. Hyers, a de Blasio aide at the time, got into a screaming match after Mr. Percoco tried to exert greater control over the speaking order and other plans for the occasion that featured both politicians, according to...
